Package com.tangosol.coherence.config.scheme

Interface NamedTopicScheme

All Superinterfaces:
NamedCollectionBuilder<NamedTopic>, Scheme, ServiceScheme, TopicScheme<NamedTopic,TopicService>
All Known Implementing Classes:
PagedTopicScheme
public interface NamedTopicScheme extends TopicScheme<NamedTopic,TopicService>
The TopicScheme class is responsible for building a fully configured instance of a NamedTopic.
Since:
Coherence 14.1.1
Author:
jk 2015.05.21
